Question: With an eastern sea route to Asia apparently at hand, King John was no longer interested in this person's far-fetched project.
Hints: This person first sailed to the Canary Islands, which belonged to Castile, where he restocked the provisions and made repairs.
By then, accusations of tyranny and incompetence on the part of this person had also reached the Court.
In 1795, when France took over the entire island of Hispaniola, this person's remains were moved to Havana, Cuba.
